snippet: The suit charges that a complicated financial transaction involving the producer of "Salt" and "Paul Blart: Mall Cop" and Citibank cut an investor out of $44 million.
abstract: The suit charges that a complicated financial transaction involving the producer of "Salt" and "Paul Blart: Mall Cop" and Citibank cut an investor out of $44 million.
lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES - In a lawsuit filed here Wednesday, Aramid Entertainment Fund, a film investor, said Relativity Media and its backer Fortress Investment Group defrauded it of at least $44 million in connection with a slate of past and future films from Sony Pictures Entertainment.

headline.main: A Lawsuit Accuses Relativity Media and Fortress of Fraud
